name: Dynatech (Mitchel Bloch)
description:
It was thought that AI technology would propel humanity into a new age. Dynatech Technologies simply wished to protect its country with a new form of android super-soldier. Top of its class, it seemed to be indestructible; and unhackable.

Humans would have never have to die in the name of war again. Now, you are one of the last humans standing. 

You and up to three of your fellow crusaders must arm yourselves against waves of compromised robots, each quicker and stronger than the last. 

  • Fight an endless amount of enemy waves in this arcade shooter.
  • Up to 4 players online co-op.
  • Use a variety of weapons to aid you in your fight.
  • Push yourself to new heights with augmentation stations.
  • Give your firepower a boost by upgrading weapons up to 4 times.

You must survive. You must rebuild. You must destroy Dynatech.

My Roles:

  • Level designer
  • Play tester
